name: SAS: Zombie Assault 4
description: Purge the undead! Intense action-shooter with deep rpg elements, including upgradeable guns and armor, unique class skills, and class special abilities. Entire game can be played single player or as a 4-player online co-op game, including PvP events like Last Man Standing.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (32 & 64bit) Processor: 2GHz or better Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 (32 & 64bit) Processor: 2.5GHz or better Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible, ATI, Nvidia or Intel HD Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
